humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest invasive tumor as 4.0 cm. Based on the rules provided, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the largest invasive tumor mass measures 4.0 cm in greatest dimension, which falls within the criteria for a T2 stage (T2: Tumor size >2 cm but ≤5 cm). Therefore, the T stage from this report is T2.
